00011 bool case_insensitive_character_comparison(char character1, char character2)
00012 {
00013     return std::toupper(character1) == std::toupper(character2);
00014 }

00028 bool Verse::case_sensitive_match(std::string search_string) const
00029 {
00030     return m_text.find(search_string) != std::string::npos;
00031 }
00032 
00033 bool Verse::case_sensitive_whole_word_match(std::string search_string) const
00034 {
00035     size_t position = m_text.find(search_string);
00036     while (position != std::string::npos)
00037     {
00038         if ((position == 0 || is_word_delimiter(m_text[position-1])) && 
00039             (position + search_string.size() == m_text.size() || is_word_delimiter(m_text[position + search_string.size()])))
00040         {
00041             return true;
00042         }
00043 
00044         position = m_text.find(search_string, position + 1);
00045     }
00046 
00047     return false;
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool Verse::case_insensitive_match(std::string search_string) const
00051 {
00052     return std::search(m_text.begin(), m_text.end(), search_string.begin(), search_string.end(), case_insensitive_character_comparison) != m_text.end();
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool Verse::case_insensitive_whole_word_match(std::string search_string) const
00056 {
00057     std::string::const_iterator position = std::search(m_text.begin(), m_text.end(), search_string.begin(), search_string.end(), case_insensitive_character_comparison);
00058     while (position != m_text.end())
00059     {
00060         if ((position == m_text.begin() || is_word_delimiter(*(position-1))) && 
00061             (position + search_string.size() == m_text.end() || is_word_delimiter(*(position + search_string.size()))))
00062         {
00063             return true;
00064         }
00065 
00066         position = std::search(position + 1, m_text.end(), search_string.begin(), search_string.end(), case_insensitive_character_comparison);
00067     }
00068 
00069     return false;
00070 }

00072 void Verse::display(std::ostream& out) const
00073 {
00074     out << m_book << " " << m_chapter << ":" << m_verse << std::endl << m_text << std::endl;
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool Verse::is_word_delimiter(char character) const
00078 {
00079     return character == ' ' || character == '.' || character == ',' || character == ';' || character == '?' || character == '!' || character == ':';
00080 }
